policy.title: Solicitation Of Funds From And By Students

issues.title: Missing Administrative Regulation for Implementation Procedures
issues.description: Education Code 51520 requires specific procedures for charitable solicitations, but no Administrative Regulation exists to provide implementation details. The Board Policy establishes the framework but lacks the procedural "how-to" requirements mandated by law.

legal_citations.text: The governing board of each school district shall adopt rules and regulations governing solicitations by charitable organizations in the schools of the district.

issues.required_language: Administrative procedures detailing: application process for charitable organizations, approval criteria, documentation requirements, supervision procedures during solicitations, and complaint procedures.

issues.title: Missing Required Application and Documentation Procedures
issues.description: Education Code 51520 requires specific application procedures for charitable organizations seeking to solicit students, but neither the BP nor AR contains these procedural requirements.

legal_citations.text: Any organization desiring to make solicitations shall make application to the governing board or its designee and shall furnish evidence of the charitable nature and financial responsibility of the organization.

issues.required_language: Procedures requiring charitable organizations to: (1) submit formal applications to the Superintendent or designee, (2) provide evidence of charitable nature and financial responsibility, (3) submit required documentation before approval.

issues.title: Missing Supervision Requirements During Solicitations
issues.description: Education Code requires that solicitations be conducted under school supervision, but neither document specifies supervision procedures or requirements.

legal_citations.text: All solicitations shall be made under the supervision of the school authorities.

issues.required_language: Procedures requiring that all charitable solicitations be conducted under direct supervision of designated school personnel, including specification of supervision responsibilities and oversight requirements.

issues.title: Missing Specific Approval Criteria
issues.description: While the policy requires prior approval, it lacks specific criteria for evaluating charitable organizations, which would help ensure consistent application and legal compliance.

legal_citations.text: shall furnish evidence of the charitable nature and financial responsibility of the organization

issues.required_language: Specific criteria for evaluating applications including: verification of nonprofit status, assessment of financial responsibility, review of charitable purposes, and alignment with educational objectives.
